task.name: imcontsub
task.shortdescription: Estimates and subtracts continuum emission from an image cube
task.description:
Estimates and subtracts continuum emission from an image cube
For each direction pixel (x, y) column in imagename (or a subset selected by region and/or box), this estimates the continuum by fitting a polynomial to one or more subsets of the channels. The continuum estimate is saved in contfile, and subtracted from imagename (or its subset) to make a spectral line estimate, which is saved in linefile.

param.name: imagename
param.shortdescription: Name of the input spectral line image
param.description:
Input image cube. Default: none
Example: imagename='ngc5921_task.im'

param.name: linefile
param.description:
Name of continuum-subtracted output spectral line cube Default: none
Example: outline='ngc5921_line.im'

param.name: contfile
param.description:
Name of output continuum cube Default: none
Example: contfile='ngc5921_cont.im'

param.name: fitorder
param.shortdescription: Polynomial order for the continuum estimation
param.description:
Polynomial order for the continuum estimation Default: 0
Example: fitorder=2

param.name: region
param.description: Region selection. Default: '' (use the full image)

param.name: box
param.shortdescription: Rectangular region to select in direction plane. Default is to use the entire direction plane.
param.description: Rectangular region to select in direction plane. Default: '' (use the entire direction plane)

param.name: chans
param.description: Channels to use. Default: '' (use all channels)

param.name: stokes
param.description: Stokes planes to use. Default: '' (use all Stokes planes)

task.example: FOR MORE INFORMATION, SEE THE TASK PAGES OF IMCONTSUB IN CASA DOCS: https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/
